logic: Dropdown values come from the NOUN_MODIFIER reference table. If the Noun changes, the system clears and refreshes dependent fields: Modifier, Extended attributes, Column values, and Generated Material Description. Rules applied: Disable Rule: Disables fields such as Mandatory, Attributes, ATR Code, Dropdown Type, UOM Description, HSN Description, Segment, Family, Class, UNSPSC Code/Description. Invisible Rule: Hides fields like Duplicate checks, Generated Material Description, UNSPSC hierarchy, Segment/Family/Class details, UNSPSC Substring, Dummy UNSPSC, etc. Mandatory Rule: Noun must be selected. Dashboard: Noun is copied to Attribute 1.

Dropdown values depend on the selected Noun (from NOUN_MODIFIER reference table). If Modifier changes, UNSPSC Code, Extended attributes, and Generated Material Description are refreshed. Mandatory Rule applied. Dashboard: Modifier is copied to Attribute 2.
Built by concatenating Noun + Modifier. Duplicity check logic ensures uniqueness. Exact Duplicate logic is applied at transaction, approval, and saved status levels.
Always Invisible
Always Invisible
Mandatory field values are based on Attributes which are coming from the reference Table-NOUN_MODIFIER
Attribute values depend on Noun + Modifier (from NOUN_MODIFIER reference table).
ATR Code is derived from Attributes.

Dropdown Type determines available values in Select Value. Reference data is created for different attributes. Reference table names are mentioned in the section - Material, Type, Speed, Series, Style data files

Dropdown values populate based on Dropdown Type. If changed, system clears, refreshes, and autosaves. When filled, it concatenates with ATR Code -> stored in Value 3, validated, and auto-submitted if Value 3 is not empty.

Free text field (activated if Dropdown Type is not set). On blur, if filled, concatenates with ATR Code -> stored in Value 3, validated, and auto-submitted if Value 3 is not empty. Value 3 is then copied into Generated Material Description.
Copy or transfer the contents of Value 3 into Generated Material Description
Built by concatenating Noun + Modifier. Final concatenated data is copied into another Generated Material Description field.
Manufacturer Name dropdown values come from MANUFACTURE_DETAILS reference table.
Manufacturer Part Number is free text. Duplicate check logic is applied on the combination of Manufacturer Name + Part Number at transaction, approval, and saved status levels.

Dropdown values depend on Noun + Modifier (from UNSPSC_FROM_NOUN_MODIFIER reference table). If no match is found -> marked as 'Not Found'. Mandatory Rule applied. Dashboard: UNSPSC copied to Attribute 3.
Always Invisible
Always Invisible
Dropdown values come from UOM reference table.
UOM Description auto-populates after validation.
Dropdown values come from HSN_CODES reference table. Mandatory Rule applied.
HSN Description auto-populates after validation.
